name: Social Noise
description: Social Noise is an independent digital creative agency with offices in Madrid and Mexico City. Founded in 2009, the agency has a solid portfolio of prestigious international brands such as Vodafone, Stage Entertainment, Ecoembes, Mastercard, Jameson, Zoco, Four Roses, Olay, Randstad, Ikea, Puma, Colgate, Burgo de Arias, Sony Pictures, El País, Airbnb, La Caixa Foundation, Ferrovial, Desigual, Levantina and Warner Music.
